intent_atoms.description: Define BoxNode Aggregate to formalize parse tree node model bridging streaming events to UI/CLI/export consumers.
Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and must not overlap payloads.
Persist Security-Scoped Bookmarks: log bookmark identifiers, refresh stale ledger entries, remove invalid recents.
VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts: manual verification on macOS and iPadOS hardware to confirm focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets as expected.
Secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG-H fixtures before replacing synthetic payloads and refreshing regression baselines.
Snapshot & CLI fixture maintenance: refresh snapshots and CLI fixtures whenever schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests.

functional_units.name: BoxNode Aggregate Definition
functional_units.description: Defines the parse tree node model that bridges streaming events to UI/CLI/export consumers.

functional_units.name: Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Enforcement
functional_units.description: Validates structural integrity ensuring child boxes stay within parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Persist Security-Scoped Bookmarks
functional_units.description: Logs bookmark identifiers, refreshes stale ledger entries, and removes invalid recent items in the filesystem access layer.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Manual VoiceOver verification on macOS/iPadOS to confirm focus command menu announcements and focus target restoration.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Automated regeneration of snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur via a specific environment variable and test command.
